messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Right after this, you will send out your
Pokémon to do battle!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
After this, I will reluctantly hand over
the prize money to you...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
What will you do after this?Why don’t you decide for yourself?
It would be much more fun that way!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Right after this, you will hurl a Poké
Ball in an astonishingly cool way!
